channel.title: math.AC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.AC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: $\delta$-lifting and $1$-dimensional analytic fields
item.description: arXiv:2512.03952v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Let $k$ be an algebraically closed complete non-Archimedean field, and let $K$ be a finitely generated field extension over $k$ with transcendence degree $1$. Equip $K$ a non-Archimedean norm extending the one on $k$, and let $\mathcal{K}$ denote the completion of $K$. We will prove that the valuation ring $\mathcal{K}^+$ admits a flat $\delta$-lifting over $\mathbb{A}_{\mathrm{inf}}(k^+)$ if and only if $\mathcal{K}$ is not of type 4.
item.dc:creator: Jiahong Yu

item.title: Connected components of qcqs schemes and projective spaces
item.description: arXiv:2401.05185v5 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this article, we first prove a general result in topology which asserts that every quasi-component of a quasi-spectral space is connected. As an important application, the structure of all connected components of every quasi-compact quasi-separated (qcqs) scheme $X$ is fully characterized. They are exactly of the form ...
item.dc:creator: Abolfazl Tarizadeh
